{{Infobox Berry |name = #58 Kee |image = [[File:Kee.png]] |caption = This Berry remains poisonous until fully ripened. Once ripe it has a spicy and sweet complex flavor. |growtime = 10h 6m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 5% |points = 3000 |flavor =
*30 spicy *30 dry *10 sweet *10 bitter *10 sour }} '''Kee''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Liechi]] and at least 1 [[Ganlon]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour 18 mins || 2 hours 36 mins || 5 hours 6 mins || 10 hours 6 mins - 20 hours 12 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KeeTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KeeTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KeeTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Kee berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Liechi.png|30px]] [[Liechi]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Liechi.png|30px]] [[Liechi]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Ganlon.png|30px]] [[Ganlon]] || || || [[File:Ganlon.png|30px]] [[Ganlon]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Liechi.png|30px]] [[Liechi]] || || || [[File:Liechi.png|30px]] [[Liechi]] || |- | || [[File:Ganlon.png|30px]] [[Ganlon]] || || || [[File:Ganlon.png|30px]] [[Ganlon]] |} {{Berries}}
